summary: Zegol is an Orc archer that can be found in the Hall of the Dead in Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
Zegol gro-Bar is a male Orc that can be found in the Hall of the Dead in Whiterun. He specializes in archery and has additional perks in light armor, sneak, and lockpicking. While not designed to be a sneaky thief, he can certainly be used while you're doing all your bad deeds as he will tolerate any criminal behavior.

[list][*][size=2]light foot perk (won't set off traps)
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]essential
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]marriable
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]will tolerate criminal behavior
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]archery, light armor, sneak, and lockpicking perks[/size]
[/*]
[/list]
Zegol should work with or without any DLC. Place this follower before any mods which alter follower behavior.
author: BananaDongle
